STEP BY STEP

Added big Parallax background with background size set to "COVER" on Section via Box Model tab.
Added two small Parallax backgrounds with background size set to "AUTO" on Section via Box Model tab.
Added vertical padding for Mobile breakpoint on Column via Box Model tab.

[/ffb_param][ffb_param route="o gen align"]text-center[/ffb_param][/ffb_paragraph_2][/ffb_column_1][/ffb_section_0]
